results.title: Offerings | Coca-Cola US
results.content: Welcome to your one-stop shop for promotions, sweepstakes, and fun across all your favorite Coca‑Cola brands. Enter our holiday sweepstakes for your chance to win an unforgettable 5-day/4-night journey to the winter wonderland of Sweden, including a stay at the world-famous ICEHOTEL. Sign up to stay in the loop on promotions, new flavors, exclusive offers and more from the Coca‑Cola brands you love. Enter now for your chance to win your own ice machine, two Diet Coke tumblers, a pack of straws for that perfect sip, plus two 12-packs of Diet Coke. ## More from Coca‑Cola ### Coca‑Cola Refreshing Films ### Coca‑Cola Vending Coca‑Cola Freestyle gives you the freedom to explore, pour, and enjoy your perfect drinks.

results.title: What brands does The Coca‑Cola offer?
results.content: + World Of Coca‑Cola Attraction. # What brands does The Coca‑Cola offer? **The Coca‑Cola Company is a total beverage company, offering more than 200 brands—from sodas to waters, from coffees to teas, from juices to kombuchas, and a growing list of flavored alcohol beverages —in more than 200+ countries and territories.**. In addition to the Coca‑Cola brands, our portfolio includes some of the world’s most valuable beverage brands, including:. * Del Valle juices and nectars. * Fresca and Fresca Mixed Coctails. * Gold Peak teas and coffees. * Jack Daniel's and Coca Cola. * Simply juices and Simply Spiked adult beverages. * Topo Chico waters and hard seltzers. We’re constantly transforming our portfolio, from reducing sugar in our drinks to bringing innovative new products to market to meet the needs of our consumers. To learn more about our brands, ingredients, and social media visit our brands page by clicking here.
